title: Plain Marshmallows
directions: Boil sugar, water and gelatin then cool completely.
Beat egg whites until peaks form.
Add syrup, vinegar, salt, vanilla, cream of tartar and dye if using.
Coat a baking tray with confectioners' sugar and pour in beaten mixture.
Chill in a fridge overnight until set.
ingredients: confectioners' sugar, to coat marshmallows and pan
red food coloring, if making pink marshmallow
